problems_validated.current_solutions: Shopify apps, third party tools, automated SMS emails, Shopify native solution
problems_validated.market_gap: Best converting fix is getting a person on the phone, which isn't automated

business_strategies.strategy: Cross-post Instagram reels to Facebook and utilize clickable links in comments
business_strategies.implementation: Use Instagram cross-post toggle, pin comments with tracking links on Facebook
business_strategies.expected_results: Viral reach (100,000 views per hour), newsletter subscriptions, YouTube/podcast growth
business_strategies.case_study: Chris's viral video getting 100K views/hour with dozens of clicks per minute from pinned comments

business_strategies.strategy: Agency model connecting creators for affiliate marketing through pinned comments
business_strategies.implementation: Play middleman between creators who don't care about top comments and those who want to promote products
business_strategies.case_study: Makeup niche example - connect makeup creators with makeup product sellers

problems_solutions.solution: Build automation tool or agency for Facebook cross-posting with comment optimization
